info.name: peaky icosahedron
info.description:
mouse controls camera. 
dual of https://shadertoy.com/view/mlcyzN

renderpass.code:
// variant of "peaky dodecahedron" https://shadertoy.com/view/mlcyzN
// ( icosahedron is the dual )

#define rot(a)    mat2(cos((a)+vec4(0,33,11,0)))              // rotation

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,a,l, P = .628; // pi/5
    vec3  R = iResolution, 
          D = normalize( 2.*vec3(U, -R.y) - R ),              // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,12), q,                                // marching point along ray 
          C = iMouse.z > 0. ? 8.*iMouse.xyz/R -4.             // camera control
                          : 3.* cos(.3*iTime + vec3(0,11,0)); // demo mode
    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.005 )           // march scene
        q = p, 
        q.yz *= rot(C.y),                                     // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(C.x),
        l = length(q.xy),a = atan(q.y,q.x), q.z<0. ? a += P, q.z = -q.z :a,// top down symetry +rot pi/5     
        q.xy = l * cos( mod(a,P*2.)-P + vec2(0,33) ),         // 5-fold symmetry
        q.xz *= rot( abs(atan(q.z,l))<.7 ? 1.26 : .55  ),     // tilt 1.26 = pi/2 - pi/10
        t = length(q.xy)+.2*q.z-1.,                           // draw pick
     // t = min(t, length(q)-2.5),                            // uncomment: mine
     // t = max(t, 2.5-length(q)),                            // uncomment: picks alone
        p += .2*t*D;                                          // step forward = dist to obj  
 
    O *= O*O*O*2.;                                            // color scheme
}
